comment._content: Seems like latins were in major league baseball since then.

comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Baldomero Pedro "Merito" Acosta Fernández (May 19, 1896 in Bauta, Cuba – November 17, 1963) was an outfielder in Major League Baseball who played five seasons for the Philadelphia Athletics and Washington Senators.
